title: The Greatest Truth of All: You Are Alive
description: 'Who am i? Who are you? We have a singular quest to better ourselves-to evolve, to move forward, to improve upon all that can be improved. To make it better.My message is about the possibility of the ultimate betterment of a human being-not of mankind, not of a country, not of a social belief, but of a human being. And it is not through religion or doctrine, not through ideas or concepts. Neither is it through hearsay or repetition.It is through each individual exploring and finding the beauty within themsleves."From the cover page, says it all.
author: Prem Rawat
